Page.title: Welcome to the FLP Controls Playground

FormattedText.htmlText:
In this playground you can select any object component from the menu on the left side. App users might have to press the button in the top left corner, to view this menu.

After selecting one item from the menulist, the main screen will show the component with all its controls. The controls can change the internal variables directly.

To play around on this webpage:

  • Simply change the value of the given controls in the control-section and observe how the component changes.
  • In some cases extra controls are given in order to make the objects inside the main object a bit more visual pleasing.

NOTE! Not each possible setting for the objects inside the objects is given!
Controls could potentially create infinitly more complex structures 'inside' the main object. The focus of this playground is the main object itself and therefor a cascaded super object is not possible.

To add a new controls page:

  1. Add new XML view to the 'view' folder. Example: './view/CustomToolboxPlayground.view.xml'
  2. (Optional) Add the corresponding controller to the 'controller' folder. Example './controller/CustomToolboxPlayground.controller.js'
  3. Add the required routes to the routing configuration in the 'manifest.json' file.
  4. Add the configured route to the 'navigationList.json' file to make it accessible in the side navigation.
